price: (51) And We have already destroyed your kinds,[1590] so is there any who will remember?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: [1590]- i.e., those similar to you in attitude and behavior when they rejected Allāh's messengers.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
